entry.title: Ford Bring on Tomorrow ExperienceiOS
entry.content: AR Experience showcasing and involving a real-world Ford Mach-E vehicle. A digital theatre production, involving 6 iPad Pro’s. The devices were required to locate and remember the location of the real-world vehicle, so that the 5 minute experience could be run back-to-back throughout the day.
